title: You can get banned for inting now.

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
Don't know why SOMEONE removed my post. It may get removed again.

Anyway, you can get banned for inting now and its instant 2 week ban it seems. literally my first offence for inting. It was a casual and becasue I can't leave the game without receiving a punishment, I feel forced to be in it, I decided to troll the same motherfucker that instant locked mid. 
I guess I deserved it.. my next punishment will be perm ban I guess? Fucking hell riot.

It was obvious inting like 1 death per minute. Level 3 at 13 minutes. It was 3 am and some %%%% decided to be a %%%%. It's not like I can talk to him in chat and get it off my chest by venting. this was the next best thing as I thought it wouldn't be bannable. It's good to see it's working though because some people do this in ranked.

Pic is riot support explaining how the report system works that I asked for about a **month ago**. Atleast give some warning on your patch notes about the report system being updated/improved.. FFS
